title.en: Practical Course of Microbiology and Virology

description.en: The aim of the practical course is to give an overview of experimental methods used in modern genetics and an experience in laboratory work. The practical course in genetics consists of seven topics that cover most important aspects in molecular genetics e.g. cloning of genes, construction of different bacterial strains, analysis of gene expression and studies of mechanisms underlying mutational processes.
description.et: Geneetika praktikumis käsitletakse põhilisi molekulaargeneetikas kasutatavaid uurimismetoodikaid ning antakse esmase eksperimentaalse töö kogemus. Geneetika praktikumi seitse teemat hõlmavad olulisemaid molekulaargeneetika meetodeid ja protsesse nagu näiteks geenide kloonimist, uute bakteritüvede konstrueerimist ning samuti geeniekspressiooni ja mutatsioonisagedust mõjutavate tegurite uurimist.

objectives.en: The goal of this practical course is to teach scientific thinking and give a proficiency to use the obtained knowledge in everyday laboratory work.
objectives.et: Geneetika praktikumi eesmärgiks on õpetada teaduslikku mõtlemist ja oskust praktikumis omandatud meetodeid kasutada teadusprobleemide lahendamisel laboritöös.

learning_outcomes.en: - have an experimental experience of methods routinely used in modern genetics
learning_outcomes.et: - põhilisi molekulaar- ning mikroobigeneetikas kasutatavaid uurimismetoodikaid

learning_outcomes.en: - are able to use the acquired skills and knowledge in everyday laboratory work
learning_outcomes.et: - praktikumis omandatud meetodeid kasutada teadusprobleemide lahendamisel laboritöös

description.et: Understanding of practicum topics and practical laboratory methods will be assessed.

grade_preconditions.et: It is mandatory to attend all the sessions of practical course and to do all practical experiments to pass the course.

grade_evaluation.et: Almost every session starts with the short test. The final grade is formed from the results of the short tests. Students failed in the short tests must take the exam. The exam is in a written form.

debt_elimination.et: Only under the agreement with supervisor of the group.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials:
A course manual Practical course in genetics (2020)
http://hdl.handle.net/10062/70509 and https://www.ester.ee/record=b5376303*est
Supervisor distributes a free copy of the manual to the participants at the first session.

description.et: The final timetable of practical works will be given on the first day of the course. The practical works are following: cloning of genes, construction of different bacterial strains, analysis of gene expression and studies of mechanisms underlying mutational processes, transposon mutagenesis and a practical work with a  fruit fly.
